channel.title: Homes on John Sperger
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on John Sperger

item.title: about
item.description: Biography I am a second year doctoral student in the Biostatistics Department at UNC. Recently I have been developing methods for determining dynamic treatment regimes capable of incorporating multiple competing outcomes such as efficacy, utilities (e.g. from a patient or a policy maker), cost, and side effect burden which are interpretable to domain practitioners.
